subject: Re: Order #SSN1650, how did it go?
description_text:
Hi
Do you have a version of sim hub that works with your haptics?

Thanks

On Wed, Jul 2, 2025, 18:26 SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few

conversations.body_text: Hi Basher Skinz,    You can download simhub 9.9.3

Hi
Iracing doesnt detect my pedals, please advise :)

On Fri, 4 Jul 2025 at 14:31, service@simsonn.com

Hi Basher Skinz,     In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the plusx.sfu file to update. Please update the pedal firmware first.

Pedals been working fine since purchase, but Iracing couldnt detect my
pedals, tried a different USB slot, now pedals wont connect to the app no
matter what i try.

   - restarted pc
   - different hubs
   - uninstalled from device manager
   - tried updating driver in device manager

Hoping someone can help
[image: simsonn.PNG]

On Tue, 8 Jul 2025 at 01:25, service@simsonn.com

Hi
I cannot get Iracing to work
I have the pedals working again, I pressed the "upgrade" button on the
control box which i assume resets it.
I have also done this "In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual
Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals
folder → and select the plusx.sfu file to update.
Please update the pedal firmware first. "

Hi
I tried going back to original USB and now the pedals are not found by the
Simsonn app
[image: simsonn.PNG]
Hi Basher Skinz,  Hello, did you see any piracy warning pop up? Rest assured, updating the firmware will not damage the pedals.
